definition: The term refers to the period of time during which an individual is engaged in work-related activities. It commonly denotes the duration of work or the specific hours allocated for work in a given day or week.

examples.german: Die Arbeitszeit beträgt 8 Stunden pro Tag.
examples.english: The working hours are 8 hours per day.

examples.german: Die Arbeitszeit kann flexibel gestaltet werden.
examples.english: The working hours can be flexible.
The working hours are recorded electronically.
The reduction of working hours was approved.
The working time regulation must be complied with.
